mapper.select: SELECT id, title, journal, year, volume, number, firstPage, lastPage, month, note key FROM articles
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles (title, journal, year, volume, number, firstPage, lastPage, month, note key) VALUES (#{title}, #{journal}, #{year}, #{volume}, #{number}, #{firstPage}, #{lastPage}, #{month}, #{note}, #{key} )
mapper.update: UPDATE articles SET title = #{title}, journal = #{journal}, year = #{year}, volume = #{volume}, number = #{number}, firstPage = #{firstPage}, lastPage = #{lastPage}, month = #{month}, note = #{note}, key = #{key} WHERE ID = #{id}
